definitions.title: Pe. 1.
definitions.body: sit, be seated:Pf. 3 ms. [[יְתִב]] Da 7:9 and (of judgment = the judge) v:Da 7:10, so Impf. 3 ms. [[יִתִָּב]] (K:§ 43.1.Beisp. b), cf. BH [[יֵשֵׁב]]) Da 7:26.
dwell, Pt. pl. abs. [[יָתְבִין]] Ezr 4:17 ([[ב]] loc.).

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: cause to dwell: Pf.  3 ms. [[הוֹתֵב]] Ezr 4:10 (acc. + [[ב]] loc.).
